text: Have a Nice Day is the ninth studio album by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and was released on September 20, 2005 through Island and Mercury Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Austria, Canada, Germany, Japan, Mexico, the Netherlands and Switzerland. It went to number 2 in Spain, the United Kingdom and the United States, number 3 in Sweden, number 4 in Finland and Italy and number 5 in Belgium. == Track listing == ==References== Category:2005 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
title: Have a Nice Day (Bon Jovi album)
